title: How to Fix "Registration Error" on Grindr: Troubleshooting

steps.title: Make sure you're in a supported region.
steps.content: Make sure you're in a supported region. If Grindr isn't allowed in your country, you'll see "Registration Error" when you try to create an account. You may be able to install a VPN to fake your location to get around this, but not everywhere. [1] X Research source Grindr is restricted by the government in these countries, but a VPN may work: China Indonesia Jordan Pakistan Qatar Saudi Arabia Turkey United Arab Emirates Grindr will usually not work with a VPN in these countries due to sanctions: Crimea Cuba North Korea Sudan Syria

steps.title: Try a different email address or sign-up method.
steps.content: Try a different email address or sign-up method. Many have found that the "Registration error" message went away when they used a different account to sign up. If you tried to register with your email address, try again using your Google account, Apple ID , or Facebook login. [2] X Research source If you see "Maximum number of accounts," there's a Grindr account using the email address you've entered. Create an account with a new email address, or tap Forgot password? on the sign-in screen to reset the password. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Disconnect from your VPN.
steps.content: Disconnect from your VPN. If you're using a VPN to create an account, Grindr may have banned the VPN's IP address due to another person's actions. Try disabling your VPN to see if that resolves the registration error.

steps.title: Submit a request to Grindr.
steps.content: Submit a request to Grindr. If you still see "Registration error," report the issue to Grindr support. As long as you haven't been banned from the platform, they can help you create your account. Here's what you'll need to do: Take a screenshot of the registration error message. Write down the time and date of the error and your current IP address . To get your IP address, go to https://whatismyipaddress.com in a web browser. Go to Grindr's "registration error" support form . Fill out the form. Type "Registration error" into the "Subject" line, then use the larger box to describe the steps you took to get the error. Paste your IP address into the box as well, select options from the rest of the menus, and tap Add file to attach your screenshot. Tap Submit to submit the form. Grindr support will get back to you at the email address you provided with fixes and/or answers.

steps.title: Make sure you've filled out all the signup form fields.
steps.content: Make sure you've filled out all the signup form fields. You won't be able to sign up for a Grindr account if any required fields are blank.

steps.title: Check the age you entered.
steps.content: Check the age you entered. You'll need to be 18 or older to use Grindr. If you entered an age or birthdate that indicates you're younger than that, you won't be able to register.

steps.title: Force-close Grindr and restart it.
steps.content: Force-close Grindr and restart it. If you're having other problems creating a Grindr account, force-closing the app on your Android , iPhone, or iPad and then reopening it may fix the problem.

steps.title: Restart your phone.
steps.content: Restart your phone. A quick phone reboot will often clear up registration problems on Grindr. [4] X Research source

steps.title: If using an Android, don't add Grindr to a secure folder.
steps.content: If using an Android, don't add Grindr to a secure folder. Samsung phones and tablets offer secure folders to protect apps and files with passwords. [5] X Research source Unfortunately, secure folders can cause Grindr not to work.

steps.title: Try switching to cellular data from Wi-Fi (or vice-versa).
steps.content: Try switching to cellular data from Wi-Fi (or vice-versa). If there's a problem with your current internet connection, you won't be able to register for Grindr. Switching to a different network may fix the problem. [6] X Research source If you're using a VPN, try disconnecting and reconnecting (or changing your location). VPNs can get pretty slow sometimes.

steps.title: Check for updates.
steps.content: Check for updates. If it's been a while since you installed the Grindr app, check for updates in the App Store (iPhone/iPad) or Play Store (Android). Also, check for operating system updates for your Android or iOS , as an out-of-date OS can lead to registration problems. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Wait about 24 hours.
steps.content: Wait about 24 hours. If you can't sign up now, give it a day and try again. If you still can't register for Grindr, go to Grindr's request form , select My issue is not listed here , and describe your issue.
